description.zh-cn: 中国作家，原名郭成清，曾任中国作家协会山东分会副主席。
description.en: Chinese writer, original name Guo Chengqing, who served as the vice-chairman of the Shandong branch of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省德州市下辖县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Dezhou City, Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国作家协会山东分会

zh-cn: 中国作家协会山东分会
en: Shandong Branch of the China Writers Association

description.zh-cn: 中国作家协会在山东省的分支机构。
description.en: The branch of the China Writers Association in Shandong Province.

en: The Story of the Big Sword

description.zh-cn: 郭澄清创作的长篇小说。
description.en: A long novel written by Guo Chenqing.

nodes.id: 新中国70年70部长篇小说典藏

zh-cn: 新中国70年70部长篇小说典藏
en: 70 Novels in 70 Years of New China Collection

description.zh-cn: 为庆祝中华人民共和国成立70周年而评选出的一套丛书，收录了70部长篇小说。
description.en: A collection of 70 long novels selected to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 郭澄清出生于山东宁津。
description.en: Guo Chenqing was born in Ningjin, Shandong.

relationships.target: 中国作家协会山东分会

description.zh-cn: 郭澄清曾担任中国作家协会山东分会副主席。
description.en: Guo Chenqing served as the vice-chairman of the Shandong branch of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 郭澄清是长篇小说《大刀记》的作者。
description.en: Guo Chenqing is the author of the long novel 'The Story of the Big Sword'.

relationships.source: 新中国70年70部长篇小说典藏

description.zh-cn: 郭澄清的长篇小说《大刀记》入选“新中国70年70部长篇小说典藏”。
description.en: Guo Chenqing's long novel 'The Story of the Big Sword' was selected for the '70 Novels in 70 Years of New China Collection'.

description.zh-cn: 根据其维基百科页面的分类“中国共产党党员”可知，郭澄清是中国共产党的党员。
description.en: According to the category 'Communist Party of China members' on his Wikipedia page, Guo Chenqing was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据其维基百科页面的分类“中国作家协会会员”可知，郭澄清是中国作家协会的会员。
description.en: According to the category 'China Writers Association members' on his Wikipedia page, Guo Chenqing was a member of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 宁津县是山东省的一个县。
description.en: Ningjin County is a county in Shandong Province.

relationships.source: 中国作家协会山东分会

description.zh-cn: 中国作家协会山东分会是中国作家协会的分支机构。
description.en: The Shandong Branch of the China Writers Association is a branch of the China Writers Association.
